name: Create Dialogflow entities from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to Google Sheets, Make will automatically create a new entity in Google Cloud Dialogflow. This template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aPTmooD8oediEfOmvAeOnNzh6FNSzHjZgQtM3gMYeIE/edit?usp=sharing).
